name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s monotonicity.vcl -t Marabou -o monotonicity.inputquery/ --network f:NO_FILE

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s monotonicity.vcl -t Agda -o monotonicity.agda --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s monotonicity.vcl -t LossFunction -o monotonicity.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE
